metadata.title: CVE-2024-57950 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Initialize denominator defaults to 1[WHAT & HOW]Variables, used as denominators and maybe not assigned to other values,should be initialized to non-zero to avoid DIVIDE_BY_ZERO, as reportedby Coverity.(cherry picked from commit e2c4c6c10542ccfe4a0830bb6c9fd5b177b7bbb7)
